js/tiny_mce/plugins/preview/editor_plugin_src.js
  1.  1  /**
  2.  2   * editor_plugin_src.js
  3.  3   *
  4.  4   * Copyright 2009, Moxiecode Systems AB
  5.  5   * Released under LGPL License.
  6.  6   *
  7.  7   * License: http://tinymce.moxiecode.com/license
  8.  8   * Contributing: http://tinymce.moxiecode.com/contributing
  9.  9   */
  10. 10  
  11. 11  (function() {
  12. 12   tinymce.create('tinymce.plugins.Preview', {
  13. 13   init : function(ed, url) {
  14. 14   var t = this, css = tinymce.explode(ed.settings.content_css);
  15. 15  
  16. 16   t.editor = ed;
  17. 17  
  18. 18   // Force absolute CSS urls
  19. 19   tinymce.each(css, function(u, k) {
  20. 20   css[k] = ed.documentBaseURI.toAbsolute(u);
  21. 21   });
  22. 22  
  23. 23   ed.addCommand('mcePreview', function() {
  24. 24   ed.windowManager.open({
  25. 25   file : ed.getParam("plugin_preview_pageurl", url + "/preview.html"),
  26. 26   width : parseInt(ed.getParam("plugin_preview_width", "550")),
  27. 27   height : parseInt(ed.getParam("plugin_preview_height", "600")),
  28. 28   resizable : "yes",
  29. 29   scrollbars : "yes",
  30. 30   popup_css : css ? css.join(',') : ed.baseURI.toAbsolute("themes/" + ed.settings.theme + "/skins/" + ed.settings.skin + "/content.css"),
  31. 31   inline : ed.getParam("plugin_preview_inline", 1)
  32. 32   }, {
  33. 33   base : ed.documentBaseURI.getURI()
  34. 34   });
  35. 35   });
  36. 36  
  37. 37   ed.addButton('preview', {title : 'preview.preview_desc', cmd : 'mcePreview'});
  38. 38   },
  39. 39  
  40. 40   getInfo : function() {
  41. 41   return {
  42. 42   longname : 'Preview',
  43. 43   author : 'Moxiecode Systems AB',
  44. 44   authorurl : 'http://tinymce.moxiecode.com',
  45. 45   infourl : 'http://wiki.moxiecode.com/index.php/TinyMCE:Plugins/preview',
  46. 46   version : tinymce.majorVersion + "." + tinymce.minorVersion
  47. 47   };
  48. 48   }
  49. 49   });
  50. 50  
  51. 51   // Register plugin
  52. 52   tinymce.PluginManager.add('preview', tinymce.plugins.Preview);
  53. 53  })();
